categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Implacable was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer of unknown specification commanded by Imperial Admiral Apwar Trigit, who served first under Ysanne Isard, and then under Warlord Zsinj, in the years following the Battle of Endor. It was destroyed in 7 ABY by Wraith Squadron, in the Battle of Ession.
